column2: select top # G.objID, G.ra, G.dec, G.lnLExp_r, G.lnLDev_r, G.petroMag_r, G.extinction_r, # as spiral, # as nvote, # as mE1_u, # as mE1_g, G.mE1_r, # as mE1_i, # as mE1_z, # as mE2_u, # as mE2_g, G.mE2_r, # as mE2_i, # as mE2_z, # as mRrCc_u, # as mRrCc_g, G.mRrCc_r, # as mRrCc_i, # as mRrCc_z, # as mRrCcPSF_u, # as mRrCcPSF_g, G.mRrCcPSF_r, # as mRrCcPSF_i, # as mRrCcPSF_z, # as mE1PSF_u, # as mE1PSF_g, G.mE1PSF_r, # as mE1PSF_i, # as mE1PSF_z, # as mE2PSF_u, # as mE2PSF_g, G.mE2PSF_r, # as mE2PSF_i, # as mE2PSF_z into mydb.SDSS_Elliptical_petroMag from Galaxy as G where G.lnlDev_r > G.lnlExp_r + # and G.lnlExp_r > # and (G.flags & (dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) + dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) + dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) )) > # and (G.flags & (dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) + dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) + dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) )) ! = dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) and (G.flags & (dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) + dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) )) = # and G.petroMag_i > # and (G.petroMag_r > # or G.petroR5#_r > #) and (G.petroMag_r > # and G.g > # and G.r > # and G.i > #) and ( (G.petroMag_r - G.extinction_r) < # and (G.petroMag_r - G.extinction_r < (# + (#/#) * (G.g - G.r) + # * (G.r - G.i) - # * #) ) and ( (G.r - G.i - (G.g - G.r) /# - #) < #) and ( (G.r - G.i - (G.g - G.r) /# - #) > #) ) or ( (G.petroMag_r - G.extinction_r < #) and ( (G.r - G.i - (G.g - G.r) /# - #) > (# - #* (G.g - G.r) )) and ( (G.g - G.r) > (# + # * (G.r - G.i) )) )
